testcase.name: Verify that User should able to search Product
Verify that User not should able to search Product Wrong product

failure.message: Testing if the URL is 'https://www.amazon.in/s?k=999999999999&ref=nb_sb_noss' in 5000ms - expected "is 'https://www.amazon.in/s?k=999999999999&ref=nb_sb_noss'" but got: "https://www.amazon.in/s?k=999999999999&crid=2RYF3B4T8H7YT&sprefix=%2Caps%2C205&ref=nb_sb_noss_2" (5190ms)
